## Project: ATM Management System
- Framework: Django 5.0 (Python)
- Database: SQLite
- Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
- Features: Authentication, Deposits, Withdrawals, Transfers, Transaction History
- Status: Fully functional and running

## Quick Start
1. Virtual environment created at .venv
2. Django installed
3. Database migrated successfully
4. Server running at http://127.0.0.1:8000/
5. Admin panel at http://127.0.0.1:8000/admin/

## Next Steps
- Create a superuser: python manage.py createsuperuser
- Access the application at http://127.0.0.1:8000/
- Register a new user and create bank accounts
- Perform transactions (deposit, withdraw, transfer)
